Method Detail

isContainer

public boolean isContainer()
Description copied from class: TComponent
Returns true if this component is a container. If component is a container, some method will also check its child components. Reduce the use of instanceof, because instanceof is a 'heavy' method.

Overrides:
isContainer in class TComponent

isSelected

public boolean isSelected()
Returns true whether this container is being selected. If any of this container childs is being selected, this container is marked as selected too.

Overrides:
isSelected in class TComponent

setComparator

findComponent

public TComponent findComponent(int x1,
                                int y1)
Finds visible child component in specified screen coordinate. The top-most child component is returned in the case of overlap child components.

If the founded child component is also a container, this method will continue searching for the deepest nested child component.

getComponentCount

public int getComponentCount()
Returns the number of components in this container.

getComponents

public TComponent[] getComponents()
Returns all child components in this container.

get

public TComponent get()
Returns the latest inserted component into this container.
